Spring Framework
  1. org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client

Uses of Package
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client

Packages that use org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client
Package
Description
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client
Support for testing Spring MVC applications via RestTestClient with MockMvc for server request handling.
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client.assertj
AssertJ support for RestTestClient.
  • Classes in org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client used by org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client
    Class
    Description
    CookieAssertions
    Assertions on cookies of the response.
    EntityExchangeResult
    ExchangeResult sub-class that exposes the response body fully extracted to a representation of type <T>.
    ExchangeResult
    Container for request and response details for exchanges performed through RestTestClient.
    HeaderAssertions
    Assertions on headers of the response.
    JsonPathAssertions
    JsonPath assertions.
    MockMvcHttpConnector
    Connector that handles requests by invoking a MockMvc rather than making actual requests over HTTP.
    MockMvcWebTestClient.ControllerSpec
    Specification for configuring MockMvc to test one or more controllers directly, and a simple facade around StandaloneMockMvcBuilder.
    MockMvcWebTestClient.MockMvcServerSpec
    Base specification for configuring MockMvc, and a simple facade around ConfigurableMockMvcBuilder.
    MockMvcWebTestClient.RouterFunctionSpec
    Specification for configuring MockMvc to test one or more router functions directly, and a simple facade around RouterFunctionMockMvcBuilder.
    RestTestClient
    Client for testing web servers that uses RestClient internally to perform requests while also providing a fluent API to verify responses.
    RestTestClient.BodyContentSpec
    Spec for expectations on the response body content.
    RestTestClient.BodySpec
    Spec for expectations on the response body decoded to a single Object.
    RestTestClient.Builder
    Steps to customize the underlying RestClient via RestClient.Builder.
    RestTestClient.MockMvcSetupBuilder
    Extension of RestTestClient.Builder for tests against a MockMvc server.
    RestTestClient.RequestBodySpec
    Specification for providing the body of a request.
    RestTestClient.RequestBodyUriSpec
    Specification for providing the body and the URI of a request.
    RestTestClient.RequestHeadersSpec
    Specification for adding request headers and performing an exchange.
    RestTestClient.RequestHeadersUriSpec
    Specification for providing request headers and the URI of a request.
    RestTestClient.ResponseSpec
    Chained API for applying assertions to a response.
    RestTestClient.ResponseSpec.ResponseSpecConsumer
    Consumer of a RestTestClient.ResponseSpec.
    RestTestClient.RouterFunctionSetupBuilder
    Extension of RestTestClient.Builder for tests against а RouterFunction MockMvc setup.
    RestTestClient.StandaloneSetupBuilder
    Extension of RestTestClient.Builder for tests against а standalone MockMvc setup.
    RestTestClient.UriSpec
    Specification for providing the URI of a request.
    RestTestClient.WebAppContextSetupBuilder
    Extension of RestTestClient.Builder for tests against а WebAppContext MockMvc setup.
    StatusAssertions
    Assertions on the response status.
    XpathAssertions
    XPath assertions for the RestTestClient.
